name: VoxelPrint [H=N Community BLOCK+A °01]
description:
_____VoxelPrint [H=N Community BLOCK+A °01] __________
This OBJKT documents the first realtime participatory design activities at the H=N BLOCK+A platform of OBJKT#329393. H=N BLOCK celebrates the H=N Community, allowing multiple users to contribute to a multi-subjective & multi-objective collaborative whole, an open architecture of collaborative objects. These shared blocks are visible as long as a visitor is Here And Now. Activities on 19.09.2021 were captured, 3908 BLOCKs were instantiated by 88 curious artists and visitors, and were explored by 230 visitors of the H=N Community.
_______ H=N BLOCK + A __________ 
H=N BLOCK+A is an extension patch(Architecture Kit) for H=N BLOCK(OBJKT#187962), enabling realtime collaborative and participatory design using an architectural kit of parts.
_________________ 
by Alexander Grasser, 2021 @grasser_alex alexandergrasser.com #collaborativeobjects #realtimearchitecture #architecturemachine
